system.effect: Allows crew to settle their disputes in a fighting arena. Poor permenantly increases morale by +2, Common by +3, Good  also provides +10 to Commerce tests with trading partners on the vessel. Best gives same bonus by also permenantly increases morale by +5. Only one per vessel.
